questionTitle: Application frameworks provide a means for creating ________ hosted applications using IDE.
questionExplanation: PaaS IDEs run the gamut from a tool that requires a dedicated programming staff to create and run to point-and-click graphical interfaces.

questionOption1: Drupal is used in major Web sites and organizes vast amounts of information
questionOption2: Fourspace is often associated with blogging tools
questionOption3: FourSquare works with photos, imports information from other social tools, and allows very attractive Web sites to be created by average users
questionExplanation: Drupal is extensively used and has broad industry impact, and it is a full-strength developer tool.

questionTitle: Which of the following is based on the notion of information management and organization?
questionExplanation: Notion of a Web site as a CMS adds a number of special features to the concept that includes rich user interaction, multiple data sources and extensive customization.

questionTitle: Which of the following environment best describes WorkXpress?
questionExplanation: 5GL environments have no programming requirement and you can host your application anywhere.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement related to the common characteristics of SOA.
questionOption1: They separate data-handling from presentation (user interface)
questionOption2: They support the incorporation of business rules, logic, and actions
questionOption3: They support packaging and deployment of applications
questionExplanation: These services differ in which language they use, support for different rendering technologies, and in other features.

questionTitle: Which of the following module feature is provided by Drupal CMS?
questionExplanation: The Drupal core by itself contains a number of modules.

questionTitle: Which of the following programming language solves problems by acting on constraints and inputs?
questionExplanation: Force.com uses a 4GL programming language environment.

questionTitle: ___________ PaaS application delivery platform creates SOA applications that work on several different IaaS vendors.
questionExplanation: Eccentex is a Culver City, California, company founded in 2005 that has a PaaS development platform for Web applications.

questionTitle: Which of the following AppBase tool allows you to assign access rights to different objects in the system?
questionExplanation: Security roles can be assigned in groups without users, and users can be added later as the application is deployed.

questionTitle: Which of the following should be replaced with question mark in the figure?
questionExplanation: A good PaaS system has certain desirable characteristics that are important in developing robust, scalable, and hopefully portable applications.
